title: 06/15/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/15/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP checks in with Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio to discuss the latest on Aaron Rodgers. Is there a shot he wouldn't play this season? Great Author Wright Thompson calls in to discuss his book "Pappyland" and some of his favorite athletes that he's profiled. And Reggie Miller makes his weekly pit-stop to discuss who he expects in the Eastern Conference Finals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP checks in with Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio to discuss the latest on Aaron Rodgers. Is there a shot he wouldn't play this season? Great Author Wright Thompson calls in to discuss his book "Pappyland" and some of his favorite athletes that he's profiled. And Reggie Miller makes his weekly pit-stop to discuss who he expects in the Eastern Conference Finals.
